metadata.title: USN-4136-1 -- wpa_supplicant and hostapd vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that wpa_supplicant incorrectly handled certain management frames. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4136-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  hostapd - 1:2.4-0ubuntu6.6 No subscription required  wpagui - 2.4-0ubuntu6.6 wpasupplicant-udeb - 2.4-0ubuntu6.6 wpasupplicant - 2.4-0ubuntu6.6 No subscription required
